mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) as business_total, COUNT(if(status = 1, 1, null))AS business_wait_allot, COUNT(if(status = 2, 1, null))AS business_wait_follow, COUNT(if(status = 3, 1, null))AS business_following, COUNT(if(status = 4, 1, null))AS business_false, COUNT(if(status = 5, 1, null))AS business_convert_customer FROM business

SELECT b.*,u.name AS assignName FROM business b LEFT JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id
b.id = #{dto.businessId}
AND b.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dto.name},'%')
AND b.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dto.phone},'%')
AND b.status = #{dto.status}
AND u.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dto.assignName},'%')
ORDER BY b.update_time DESC
